label: Lifting Straps
short_description: Removes grip as a bottleneck. Increases the load to the target muscle while significantly reducing forearm/grip stimulation.

label: Chains/Bands
short_description: Adds resistance that increases as the muscle shortens (lockout). Maximizes tension at the strongest point of the lift.

label: Fat Grips
short_description: Increases the diameter of the handle. Drastically increases the demand on the hand and forearm flexors.

label: Weight Belt
short_description: Weight belt for core bracing on heavy lifts
